features.title: AI-Powered Legal Assistant for Rural India
features.subtitle: We make justice accessible by translating complex paperwork into simple conversations, ensuring no one is left behind due to legal jargon or digital illiteracy.

voice.title: Simple Voice Conversations
voice.desc: Helps villagers complete legal and government paperwork through natural Hindi and regional dialects.

docs.title: Auto-Generates Documents
docs.desc: Creates ready-to-submit forms, affidavits, and legal notices based on your conversation.

issues.title: Solves Common Issues
issues.desc: Expertly handles Aadhaar, pension, land disputes, missing certificates, and fraud-related cases.

human.title: Human Escalation
human.desc: For complex issues, we seamlessly connect you with qualified local paralegals for expert assistance.

about.title: Bridging the Justice Gap for 900 Million Indians
about.subtitle: Essential legal processes are broken for rural communities. From inaccessible government services to intimidating court procedures, the system is designed for failure.

docs.title: Document & Court Summons Errors
docs.desc: Low digital literacy and complex legal language lead to mistakes and missed deadlines.

welfare.title: Welfare Scheme & Land Gaps
welfare.desc: Outdated records and middlemen exploitation block access to rightful benefits and property claims.

access.title: Limited Legal Access
access.desc: Courts are far, lawyers are expensive, and reliable legal aid is often out of reach for many villagers.

whyNow.title: The Perfect Confluence of Factors
whyNow.subtitle: We are uniquely positioned to deliver AI-powered legal access to 900 million underserved Indians because the technology, infrastructure, and user readiness have finally aligned.

factors.digitalIndia: Digital India infrastructure is now operational and widespread.
factors.ai: Advanced AI models for local languages have matured and are reliable.
factors.reforms: Government legal aid reforms are expanding rapidly.
factors.adoption: Rural digital adoption and trust in online platforms are at an all-time high.

howItWorks.title: From Conversation to Resolution in 6 Simple Steps

access.name: Access
access.desc: User opens the Nyaya Saathi app or visits a nearby kiosk.

speak.name: Speak the Problem
speak.desc: User explains the issue in Hindi or their local dialect; no legal terms needed.

ai.name: AI Understands
ai.desc: Our AI extracts key information, identifies the issue, and asks clarifying questions.

generate.name: Auto-Generate Documents
generate.desc: The system instantly fills forms and generates affidavits, letters, or certificates.

guide.name: Guide & Submit
guide.desc: We provide clear voice guidance, print necessary forms, and help track the status.

escalate.name: Human Escalation
escalate.desc: Complex cases are intelligently routed to our network of local paralegals for expert help.
